#summary The kbd element represents a display of user-entered text.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *kbd element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5] says, "The `kbd` element typically represents keyboard input, although it may also be used to represent other input, such as voice commands."
